LocalSourceProps.name: accept
LocalSourceProps.description: Set accepted file types. Accepts everything if left undefined

LocalSourceProps.name: uploadFile
LocalSourceProps.description:
(file: File,{' '} {`{ onProgress: (progress: number) => void onSuccess: (response: unknown) => void onError: (error: unknown) => void }`} ) => string

A function for manually controlling the network request for file upload. An alternative to using getEndpoint which handles the network request itself.

LocalSourceProps.name: beforeLocalFileUpload
LocalSourceProps.description: Optional async function that is invoked when selecting or dropping in a local file. If you want to restrict certain uploads, you can use this callback. Returning true continues the upload, while false will prevent upload. {'(files: ThumbnailListItem[]) => Promise'}

LocalSourceProps.name: dropzoneContentRenderer
LocalSourceProps.description: An optional content renderer for the dropzone. Accepts{' '} {'{ open, disabled, errorMessage }'} as a single argument, allowing to control the dropzone and display different content depending on dropzone state

LocalSourceProps.name: getEndpoint
LocalSourceProps.description:
(file: File) => string

A function returning an upload URL for a given file. An alternative to uploadFile which allows manual control of the network request for file upload.

LocalSourceProps.name: getHeaders
LocalSourceProps.description:
(file: File) => object

A function returning an upload request headers. Returns empty object by default.

LocalSourceProps.name: getMethod
LocalSourceProps.description:
(file: File) => HTTPRequestMethod

A function returning an upload HTTP method for a given file. Returns POST by default.

LocalSourceProps.name: getPayload
LocalSourceProps.description:
(file: File) => FormData

A function returning an upload payload FormData{' '} object for a given file. When defined, getPayloadKey is ignored.

LocalSourceProps.name: getPayloadKey
LocalSourceProps.description:
(file: File) => string

A function returning an upload payload FormData key for a given file. Returns file by default.
